projects.title: Proactive Employee System
projects.summary: AI assistant that proactively handles routine tasks
projects.details:
Full autonomous AI agent system:

**Components:**
- Morning briefing (6am variable cron)
- Periodic email/calendar checks via heartbeat
- Trade signal monitoring (Volatility Therapy)
- Dashboard updates
- Receipt filing

**Status:** Sub-agents working with Haiku model, master prompt drafted

**Blockers:**
- VT docs still needed
- Cron jobs not yet configured
- Final approval on proactive prompt

projects.title: Volatility Therapy Swing Trading
projects.summary: Monitor VT Discord for swing signals, track positions
projects.details:
**Completed:**
- Full documentation at ~/clawd/projects/volatility-therapy-swing.md
- vt-signal-monitor.js for Discord monitoring
- Manual execution workflows documented

**System:**
- Monitors #swing-signals in VT Discord
- Notifies via ntfy (vt-alerts topic)
- Manual execution in Tradovate
- Position tracking in Directus

projects.title: JMP.chat Phone Number
projects.summary: Get dedicated phone number via JMP (XMPP/SIP)
projects.details:
**Goal:** Real phone number for Aurora via open protocols

**Status:** Payment blocked, waiting on JMP support

**What's done:**
- XMPP server set up (xmpp.kos.plus)
- Account created: aurora@xmpp.kos.plus
- Number selected: (608) 352-6060

**Blocker:** Credit cards declined, JMP support contacted (8hr response time)

projects.title: Aurora Dashboard
projects.details:
**Completed:** ✅

**Features:**
- Daily note from Aurora
- Calendar events (iCloud CalDAV)
- Todoist tasks with completion
- Email scan reports
- Receipt filing
- PWA (installable on mobile)

**URL:** https://dash.kos.plus
**Repo:** echokos/aurora-dash (Cloudflare Pages)

projects.title: Haiku Model Configuration
projects.details:
**Problem:** Sub-agents couldn't use Haiku - "model not allowed" error

**Root cause:** Model ID was wrong in config
- ❌ Wrong: anthropic/claude-haiku-3-5
- ✅ Correct: anthropic/claude-3-5-haiku-20241022

**Impact:** Sub-agents now cost-effective (~$0.001/turn vs $0.07+)

**Documented:** Added to MEMORY.md for future reference

projects.title: Stripe → QuickBooks Worker
projects.summary: Cloudflare Worker to sync Stripe payments to QBO
projects.details:
**Status:** Running, needs daily monitoring

**Health check:**
```bash
curl -s https://aurora-stripe-webhook.kos.workers.dev/health
```

**What it does:**
- Listens for Stripe webhooks
- Creates QBO invoices automatically
- Queues via Hookdeck

**Monitoring:** Check daily via HEARTBEAT.md
